trends: There have been no other sightings in bryecville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: i saw a ufo decend at a 45 deg angle very fast then slow down very fast and then change derection ,and then spin around 360 degrees and then it flew over the trees and out of sight
divs: Sighting Detailsit was early in the evening, i was sitting on my front porch ,my porch fases south,out of the corner of my eye to the east i saw what i thaught was an airplane coming in for a landing but it was coming in very fast,probably 5 to 600 mph then it slowed very fast to less than probably around a 100 mph,at first i only saw one pulsating whit light,then as it turned to the east i could see that it had pulsating lights on each end of it. i live within 15 miles of a large airport, i see airplanes all the time coming in for landings day and night as my home sits directly under one of the aprouch pathes for the airport {jacksonville international airport },now back to my sighting,after the ufo slowed it turned yo the east and then headed east probably 4 to 500 yards,then to my amasement it swivaled 360 degrees in a circle,my wife saw it too but was headed in the house and didnot see it do the 360 spin,when it did the 360,that startled me and i jumped up and said,{did you see what that thing just did,it just did a 360 deg tirn and cept going},but at the time my wife was headed in the front door of our house and did not see it,after it made the 360 it continude to head east slowly and flew over the tree line and out of sight,i am 49 years old and i have thousands of airplanes in my time and i am telling you, this was no airplane,helicopter,bolloon,blimp,reflection,or any aircraft i have ever seen,also this thing made no noise eccept when it was coming in at high speed,and then all i heard was the sound of air moving out of the way of an object traveling at high speed,but after it slowed i could not hear any noise,after it did the 360 i knew i was looking at some kind of alien spacecraft.after seeing this i truly beleive we are not alone in the universe.the lights on this thing were not flashing like an aiaplanes lights but pulsating and the lights were elongated on each end oval in the middle,i have never seen anything like that before and it kind of makes me nervese,why are they coming here and what do they want?.
